channel.title: International talk like a pirate day '08
channel.description:
International Talk Like A Pirate Day – September 19th
Yo, Ho, Yo, Ho, It's "Talk Like A Pirate" Day! That time in September when sea dogs remember That grown-ups still know how ta play! When wenches are curvy and dogs are all scurvy And a soft-wear patch covers your eye, Ta hell with our jobs, for one day we're all swabs And buccaneers all till we die!
So hoist up the mainsils and shut down your brain cells, They only would get in the way, Avast there, me hearty, we're havin' a party, It's "Talk... Like... A Pirate" Day!
Hey there buccaneers, its that time of year coming up. Post your comments 'eeere.
Facebook link; http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2208999021
A jolly rogers member's creation; http://www.users.on.net/~mnelson/pirate.swf – excellent work MNELSON!

item.title: International talk like a pirate day '08
item.dc:creator: @postmanpat9 postmanpat9
item.description:
@postmanpat9 wrote:

International Talk Like A Pirate Day – September 19th

Yo, Ho, Yo, Ho,
It’s “Talk Like A Pirate” Day!
That time in September when sea dogs remember
That grown-ups still know how ta play!
When wenches are curvy and dogs are all scurvy
And a soft-wear patch covers your eye,
Ta hell with our jobs, for one day we’re all swabs
And buccaneers all till we die!

So hoist up the mainsils and shut down your brain cells,
They only would get in the way,
Avast there, me hearty, we’re havin’ a party,
It’s “Talk… Like… A Pirate” Day!

Hey there buccaneers, its that time of year coming up. Post your comments 'eeere.
